title: Jonathan Horst returns to YouTube with Thinking Different after Mac Address hiatus and Linus Media Group exit
summary_full: Jonathan Horst, former Mac Address host under Linus Media Group, has returned to YouTube with a new independent channel called “Thinking Different.” He announced the comeback on X on February 12, 2026. After leaving during 2024 layoffs, Horst shared gratitude for his time at Mac Address and now plans broader tech content beyond Apple.
